channel.title: Can anyone help me?
channel.description:
Okay, I need help with my auto re-starter. It has only worked properly one time but since then it doesn't work, either it will start my server then when its time to restart another prompt comes up saying
"Voule Auto Re-starter Restarting server Error connecting to listener- port 43594 already in use?"
or when I start it it says
"Could not find process: java Voule Auto Re-starter Restarting server."
@echo off tskill java /a echo Voule Auto restart echo Restarting server title Voule Auto Restarter java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls
This is whats in the .bat file of the voule re-starter. *NOTE- I have the Re-starter.exe to run the program*
Can anyone help me out? If so it will be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

Okay, I need help with my auto re-starter. It has only worked properly one time but since then it doesn’t work, either it will start my server then when its time to restart another prompt comes up saying

“Voule Auto Re-starter Restarting server Error connecting to listener- port 43594 already in use?”

or when I start it it says

“Could not find process: java Voule Auto Re-starter Restarting server.”

@echo off
tskill java /a
echo Voule Auto restart
echo Restarting server
title Voule Auto Restarter
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
cls

This is whats in the .bat file of the voule re-starter. NOTE- I have the Re-starter.exe to run the program

Can anyone help me out? If so it will be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
